tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE public.sentiment_analysis_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    post TEXT,
    likes INT,
    comments INT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    comment_content VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    comment_date TIMESTAMP
);
